page.title: 04ST.STEPHEN'S CH. SPARSHOLT
page.content: St:Stephen's Church is the only church in Sparsholt.It is a Church of England church situated in the centre of the village.It dates back to the 12th century.The chamber for the organ was made in 1882_83,but the organ was not put in until 5 years later.There is an altar and a small chapel on either side.There are three different services,Holy Communion,Matins and Evensong.There is a midnight service at Christmas.The congregation are mainly elderly.At special services about fifty people attend and at normal services about ten.Once a month there is a children's sevice.The congregation provides most of the money for the upkeep of the church.
